thread.title: AstraZeneca: FDA wants more data on diabetes drug
thread.title_full: AstraZeneca: FDA wants more data on diabetes drug - MarketWatch

author: Tapan Panchal
title: AstraZeneca: FDA wants more data on diabetes drug
text:
LONDON--AstraZeneca PLC (AZN.LN) said Friday that the U.S. Food and Drug Administration has asked for more clinical data in relation to a new diabetes treatment.
The U.S. regulator has issued a letter to the company stating that it requires more data from the U.K. pharmaceutical company to support its new drug application for the fixed-dose combination of saxagliptin and dapagliflozin, which are used for treating type two diabetes in adults.
AstraZeneca said it will work closely with the regulator to determine the next steps for the application and said it remains committed to the development of the drug.
Write to Tapan Panchal at tapan.panchal@wsj.com
